name: Dwarf
description: Stout and hardy humanoids, known for their craftsmanship, resilience, and strong connections to the earth

Age of a Dwarf.description: Dwarves mature at the same rate as humans, but they're considered young until they reach the age of 50. On average, they live about 350 years.

Size of a Dwarf.description: Dwarves stand between 120cm and 150cm tall and average about 67.5kg. Your size is Medium.

Speed of a Dwarf.description: Your base walking speed is 7.5m. Your speed is not reduced by wearing heavy armor.

Darkvision of a Dwarf.description: Accustomed to life underground, you have superior vision in dark and dim conditions. You can see in dim light within 18m of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

Tool Proficiency of a Dwarf.description: You gain proficiency with the artisan's tools of your choice: smith's tools, brewer's supplies, or mason's tools.

Stonecunning.description: Whenever you make an Intelligence (History) check related to the origin of stonework, you are considered proficient in the History skill and add double your proficiency bonus to the check, instead of your normal proficiency bonus.

Languages of a Dwarf.description: You can speak, read, and write Common and Dwarvish. Dwarvish is full of hard consonants and guttural sounds, and those characteristics spill over into whatever other language a dwarf might speak.
